title: january 16: prohibition or not
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the passage of prohibition, or the laws that banned alcohol in the 1920s. She also revisits a ridiculous mishap with Jimmy Buffet, the police, and Bono. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
